title: Will Greenwood's verdict on England and South Africa's centres for the World Cup final
text:
England take on South Africa in the final of the 2019 World Cup in Yokohama on Saturday, and in the lead up to the game our experts will be taking a closer look at the two teams in key positions.

On Tuesday, Austin Healey broke down the back threes and here, 2003 World Cup winner Will Greenwood casts an eye over the centres on both sides... assuming Eddie Jones sticks rather than twists in midfield.

South Africa

Damian de Allende and Lukhanyo Am

When these two are on song, and South Africa have their press defence really working, with their centres completely in unison with their wings, it is a pretty brutal prospect.

Am is basically a super-speedy...
description: England take on South Africa in the final of the 2019 World Cup in Yokohama on Saturday, and in the lead up to the game our experts will be taking a closer look at the two teams in key positions.
